title: Daily Algorithmic Trading Portfolio: Architecture + Performance
description: How I run a once-per-day paper-trading rebalance pipeline across 10 independent strategy modules and track risk metrics.
intro: This project is a daily algorithmic trading portfolio running on Alpaca paper trading. Instead of relying on one signal, I combine 10 independent strategy modules and rebalance once each trading day.
execution: Execution is fully automated through AWS Lambda. At 3:50 PM ET, the system evaluates signals, applies risk constraints, computes target weights, and rebalances positions into the close.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 1: Regime-Aware Hedging
strategyOverview.description: Uses long-term market trend state plus short-term momentum extremes to switch between growth exposure, volatility hedges, and defensive cash-like instruments.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 2: High-Frequency Volatility Rotation
strategyOverview.description: Scales into volatility products during overbought risk conditions and rotates into inverse sector exposure when specific industries become statistically stretched.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 3: Corner-Case Volatility Capture
strategyOverview.description: Targets extreme market states by rotating between different volatility leverage levels and only engaging dip-buy setups when long-term market structure is constructive.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 4: Trend + Relative-Strength Allocator
strategyOverview.description: Compares managed-futures versus technology leadership, then allocates to top/bottom ranked leveraged instruments based on short-term relative-strength momentum.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 5: Emerging Markets Flight-to-Quality
strategyOverview.description: Trades emerging markets long/short exposure by combining oversold triggers with cross-asset bond-versus-equity risk signals.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 6: QQQ Liquidity Rotation
strategyOverview.description: Runs overbought hedging checks across broad sectors, then rotates into defensive or offensive assets depending on volatility and bond-risk alignment.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 7: QQQ Trend-and-Mean-Reversion Hybrid
strategyOverview.description: Uses moving-average structure for trend direction, then overlays short-term mean reversion entries when long-term trend remains intact.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 8: Emerging Markets Versioned Model
strategyOverview.description: A versioned emerging-markets module that emphasizes confirmation from bond leadership and uses directional leverage accordingly.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 9: Treasury Momentum and Hedge
strategyOverview.description: Trades long-duration treasury directionally with optional volatility overlays, including inverse treasury exposure in sustained bond downtrends.

strategyOverview.title: Strategy 10: Gold Trend Reversal Engine
strategyOverview.description: Combines multi-horizon moving-average trend filters with RSI reversal thresholds to switch between leveraged long-gold and inverse-gold exposure.
